name: Volleyball FighterZ
description:
Local versus multiplayer for two, using one keyboard. 

Controls:
A D / Left Right - Run
W / Up - Jump
S / Down - Block
Shift / N - Upward Strike
Alt / M - Forward Strike

Use two strike buttons in quick succession for a special button combo that gives the ball a unique behaviour. 
When on the opponent's side of the beach, using strike buttons attacks them by either kicking sand in their eyes, or shoving them away. These can be blocked with the down direction.
